description: Support to the Ministry of Finance  of Georgia in Donor Coordination and Public Finance Management Reform

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Enhanced capacity of the Ministry of Finance  (1) in donor coordination through enhancement of a functioning online Management Information System serving as a searchable database on donor activities present in the country,  development of web pages with updated details of donors’ strategies, contribution to Joint Task Force on Aid Coordination and to Sectoral Working Groups and (2) in various areas of international taxation(e.g. transfer pricing; model OECD convention/DTA; harmful tax practices, thin capitalization etc.) notably where the OECD instruments, guidelines and cutting-edge knowledge exist though training and/or module development, targeted advisory services to ensure that regulations related to international taxation issues, which will follow the adoption of the 2010 Tax Code, will be in line with OECD instruments, guidelines and best practices.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: MoFinance Donor Coordination

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
